originalText.text: Irina and Seth are great specialists. Irina is a real wizard: at first, she found for me an apartment for rent, perfect at all points! Afterwards, I wanted to buy an apartment, and Irina found the apartment of my dreams! It was almost impossible, because there were no apartments meeting my criteria on the market, but Irina did everything in her power and showed all her realtor skills to find The Apartment and persuade sellers to make the deal happen. I’m so grateful to Irina and Seth! They a simply the best!

text.text: Irina and Seth are great specialists. Irina is a real wizard: at first, she found for me an apartment for rent, perfect at all points! originalText.text: Irina and Seth are Real Estate rockstars!!! We met each other 4 years ago and it's amazing to see how successful their journey has been. Seth's and Irina's superpower is the unwavering commitment to fulfilling their clients' Real Estate dreams. They're known for relentless work ethic, attention to detail and integrity. Irina and Seth are such natural collaborators and building interpersonal relationships is where they truly shine. I love them and couldn't recommend this team more!!!

originalText.text: I know Irina for almost 5 years. Our partnership began in 2017, and since then we made several projects - from articles publishing to printing a book with her participation on how to invest and move to the United States. Irina is an Expert with a capital "E" - always provides the detailed information, easy to communicate with. I want to say Thank you and I hope there are more helpful projects to carry out!

originalText.text: Irina Balueva is wonderful to work with! She is prompt, detail-oriented, and very mindful of how others feel. The home buying process is so chaotic, but  when you have Irina on your side, it's a lot more manageable.

originalText.text: Knowing Irina for more than few years already - its just an amazing professional - extremely helpful to any answer any questions regarding real estate in NY and  in fact any other questions too) its pleasure to work with her!
